purpose: The email announces two postdoctoral positions available at UCLouvain, Belgium, specifically for candidates with a Ph.D. in computer science who are currently outside Belgium. It highlights the competitive salary, flexible starting date, and the opportunity to work on the RAINDROP project, which focuses on adapting cloud applications to utilize distributed cloud and edge resources. The positions allow for independent research projects under the mentorship of experienced professors, with various target themes outlined for potential research. Interested candidates are encouraged to contact the professors for further discussion and to submit their CV and publication record.
